forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 20C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
